title: Onboarding
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The apple tv device is connected to proxy

AND

+ The user launches the MLB app for the first time (May force quit and relaunch as well)
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Navigating through the onboarding flow while analyzing proxy returns

AND

+ While viewing the http://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net call generated

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14887436)
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user should observe a mid return in the CONTENTS:FORM section

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14887437)

title: Verify data is being sent to Adobe
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched the app 

AND

+ Content playback is confirmed on device
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user analyzes the Adobe return https://ans.mlb.com in proxy
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe the Contents returned in "FORM" view

AND

The following Adobe returns can be observed:

- Context
- contentType
- title (VOD)
- assetName (Game)
- Slug
- Pev2 (Action)
- contentId
- feedName (Game)
- Entitlements

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14373961)

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14887435)

title: Adobe Tags For Non-Games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is observing the proxy response from:

http://ans.mlb.com
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user can scroll to the contentType return

AND

+ The report should return a Non-MLBN label such as:

contentType = SLive

title: Adobe Tags For Live and Archived Games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is viewing a live or archived game

AND 

+ The user is observing the proxy response from:
http://ans.mlb.com
custom_steps:
WHEN 

+ Searching for the contentType return in the "Contents" response
custom_expected:
THEN 

+ ContentType = Live or ContentType = Archived will be returned
